ExternalServiceRegistration.label: ProntoOrders
ExternalServiceRegistration.schema: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"title":"Pronto Orders API (Demo)","version":"1.0.0","description":"Demo Orders API for Pronto. Swagger 2.0 schema for Salesforce External Services import."},"schemes":["https"],"host":"example.invalid","basePath":"/","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"securityDefinitions":{"ApiKeyAuth":{"type":"apiKey","name":"x-api-key","in":"header","description":"Demo shared API key. In Salesforce, add this as a Named Credential custom header."}},"security":[{"ApiKeyAuth":[]}],"paths":{"/health":{"get":{"operationId":"getHealth","summary":"Health check","security":[],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"type":"object","required":["ok"],"additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"ok":{"type":"boolean"}}}}}}},"/openapi.json":{"get":{"operationId":"getOpenApi","summary":"OpenAPI 3 schema (JSON)","security":[],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OpenAPI document","schema":{"type":"object"}}}}},"/swagger.json":{"get":{"operationId":"getSwagger","summary":"Swagger 2 schema (JSON)","security":[],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Swagger document","schema":{"type":"object"}}}}},"/orders":{"get":{"operationId":"listOrders","summary":"List orders","parameters":[{"name":"contactEmail","in":"query","required":true,"type":"string","description":"Customer contact email (required)."},{"name":"last","in":"query","required":false,"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":100,"default":50,"description":"Return the last N orders (newest first)."},{"name":"orderDate","in":"query","required":false,"type":"string","description":"Filter orders by an exact order date (YYYY-MM-DD)."},{"name":"daysBack","in":"query","required":false,"type":"integer","minimum":0,"maximum":3650,"description":"Only return orders within the last N days, relative to the latest demo order date for that email."}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Array of orders","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Order"}}},"default":{"description":"Error","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Error"}}}}},"/orders/{orderId}":{"get":{"operationId":"getOrderById","summary":"Get order by id","parameters":[{"name":"orderId","in":"path","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Order","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Order"}},"404":{"description":"Not found","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Error"}},"default":{"description":"Error","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Error"}}}}},"/orders/by-email/{email}":{"get":{"operationId":"listOrdersByEmail","summary":"List orders by contact email (path form)","parameters":[{"name":"email","in":"path","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Array of orders","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Order"}}},"default":{"description":"Error","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Error"}}}}}},"definitions":{"Order":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"required":["orderId","contactEmail","storefrontName","orderDate","orderStatus","totalAmount","currency","lineItemsText"],"properties":{"orderId":{"type":"string","example":"5f2a9c1d3e4b7a8c"},"contactEmail":{"type":"string"},"storefrontName":{"type":"string"},"orderDate":{"type":"string"},"orderStatus":{"type":"string","example":"Out for Delivery"},"totalAmount":{"type":"number","format":"float"},"currency":{"type":"string"},"lineItemsText":{"type":"string"},"estimatedDeliveryAt":{"type":"string","description":"Present only for orders that are currently out for delivery. Calculated at request time."},"etaMinutes":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Present only for orders that are currently out for delivery. Minutes from request time to ETA.","example":50}}},"Error":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"required":["code","message"],"properties":{"code":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"correlationId":{"type":"string"}}}}}
